Title: A Coffee in Berlin
Actors: Tom Schilling, Katharina Schüttler, Justus von Dohnányi, Andreas Schröders
Plot: This tragicomedy is a self-ironic portrait of a young man who drops out of university and ends up wandering the streets of the city he lives: Berlin. The film deals with the desire to participate in life and the difficulty to find one's place.
Production: Schiwago Film GmbH, Arte, Hessischer Rundfunk, Chromosom Filmproduktion
